author: marrs
msg: Instead of reading system properties for certain configurable flags, we now use framework properties. These can be specified per framework instance, but fall back to system properties if nothing has been set at the framework level.

author: stefanegli
msg: SLING-4359 et al : setting log level back to normal for all tests - and only to DEBUG for ClusterTest, TopologyEventTest - might have been involved in causing the OOME due to ClusterLoadTest holding back on log output..

author: tross
msg: - Added all the code for managing the lifecycle of external containers:
- When a container (broker) is connected, the pattern addresses are established
on the connected router and propagated to the non-connected routers.
- When the container connection is lost, the pattern addresses are removed and
